subject: X Games
Sports Injuries
Snowmobiles
lead_paragraph: Despite a rash of recent injuries to some of their top rivals, the freestyle snowmobiling competitors gathered in Aspen, Colo., still plan to try their riskiest stunts.
snippet: Despite a rash of recent injuries to some of their top rivals, the freestyle snowmobiling competitors gathered in Aspen, Colo., still plan to try their riskiest stunts.
